info.name: Heritage Hotel Fermai
info.description: Heritage Hotel FERMAI, a century-old Art
info.longDescription: Heritage Hotel FERMAI, a century-old Art Nouveau gem by Petar Senjanović, stands in Split's bustling core. Just 500 m from the 1700-year-old Diocletian's Palace, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Explore the lively farmers market or stroll to the ferry port. Each visit promises a meaningful connection to Split’s rich past and vibrant surroundings. Embrace the Mediterranean spirit with local cuisine and a serene atmosphere.
